definition: land used for growing plants/site used for public recreation/abbr. for a place ending in 園|园, such as a botanical garden 植物園|植物园, kindergarten 幼兒園|幼儿园 etc

sentences.english: This paper talks about related problems with campus culture construction in higher institutes .
sentences.chinese: 本文對高校校園文化建設的相關問題加以論述。

sentences.english: You can have a lot of fun for cheap close to campus.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在校園附近玩得很開心，而且花錢也不多。

sentences.english: Indeed, there are a fair number of Mr. Lonelyhearts on campus.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，孤獨先生在校園裏確實不少。

sentences.english: The campus boasts elegant environment with green plants and fragrant flowers, which is excellent for learning and living.
sentences.chinese: 校園環境幽雅，綠樹成蔭，鳥語花香，宜學宜居。

sentences.english: That's how schoolyard bullies run playgrounds and global godfathers do it everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 這就是校園欺負運行操場和全球教父做到無處不在。

sentences.english: Walk around Richmond, the American International University in London.
sentences.chinese: 里士滿倫敦美國國際大學校園行。

sentences.english: Do you the drug-testing scheme is practical?
sentences.chinese: 你認爲政府的校園驗毒計劃是否可行？

sentences.english: Welcome to the student-created video tour of the University of Cincinnati.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎您瀏覽辛辛那提大學主校園的視頻介紹。

sentences.english: Flowers bloom all over our campus.
I have already separated from the school days and stepped into the society.
sentences.chinese: 我已經脫離菁菁校園，正式步入社會。

sentences.english: Also included is a service-learning component in which students raise awareness about drugs across campus.
sentences.chinese: 同時，還包括服務性學習部分，以提高學生對於校園。

sentences.english: Young couple be smooching all over campus after finishing finals.
sentences.chinese: 期末考結束後，年輕愛侶在校園各處熱烈擁吻。

sentences.english: He is almost a hero-like character on the campus.
sentences.chinese: 在校園中他幾乎就是一個英雄。

sentences.english: I asked myself, in an isolated corner of the campus.
sentences.chinese: 我一遍又遍地詰問自己，在校園孤零的一角。

sentences.english: Remember ecological civilization into the campus it?
sentences.chinese: 還記的生態文明進校園麼？

sentences.english: BE what make the campus life that we enrich back a riotous color gradually?
sentences.chinese: 是什麼使我們豐富的校園生活漸退了繽紛的色彩呢？

definition: elementary school (Tw)/abbr. for 國民小學|国民小学[guo2 min2 xiao3 xue2]
to pass through/to penetrate/by means of/via
to extend/to spread/to popularize/generalization/promotion (of a product etc)
site developed for a group of related enterprises/(industrial or technology) park
